name: DashUI

description.en: DashUI is comprehensive web-based visualisation with unlimited freedom of design for ioBroker.
description.de: DashUI ist eine umfangreiche webbasierte Visualisierung mit uneingeschränkter Gestaltungsfreiheit für ioBroker.
description.ru: DashUI это гибкий и мощный модуль визуализации для ioBroker, основанный на Web-Технологиях.

whatsNew: (Bluefox) Do not stringify and parse hqWidgets and bars options.
(Bluefox) Remove processing of hqWidgets from dashui.js and dashuiEdit.js
(Bluefox) Show full size background if size of view is set
(Bluefox) Translate some new words for edit mode
(Bluefox) Extend screen size settings to portrait and landscape
(Bluefox) Fix bug with hqWidgets and radius 0px
(Bluefox) Fix bug with hqWidgets/info and value 0
